title: Mathematics - a foundation course: groups 1 (TEFC)
creator_credit: Robert Clamp, BBC-TV and Open University
brief_description: Mathematical meaning of the term “group”, basic requirements, by inter-changing spheres in two different arrangements we can arrive at the same group, (klein 4), symmetry throughout history, predicting vibrations of water molecules.
